name: Americano Coffee
description: Americano Coffee is a type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water, but with different flavor.

name: Black Coffee
description: Black coffee is simply coffee that is normally brewed without the addition of additives such as sugar, milk, cream.

name: Espresso Coffee
description: In Espresso a small amount of boiling water is forced under 9–10 bars of pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino Coffee
description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Austria and is prepared with steamed milk foam.

name: Macchiato Coffee
description: Caffè macchiato, sometimes called espresso macchiato, is an espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.

name: Decaf Coffee
description: Decaf is short for decaffeinated coffee. It's coffee from coffee beans that have had at least 97% of their caffeine removed.
